text: it's like skiing when you're going slow
your eyes only need to focus a few
meters in front of you to adjust to
changes in the course but if you're
speeding downhill you need to look
farther ahead to plan your moves when
it's moving slowly Joe's deep racer
model focuses a short distance ahead
when deciding whether to turn but at
higher speeds the car looks at a
waypoint farther down the track and
